NCS – Important Timetable Change
Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c<>"",""&(Contact.Parent_Name__c)&"","Parent or Guardian")},
Due to unforeseen circumstances we have had to change the location of the meeting point for {!Contact.FirstName}'s first day of NCS.
{!Contact.FirstName}'s new meeting point is The Osmani Trust, 58 Underwood Road E1 5AW.
Please click here to see the updated timetable: https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/assets/Tower_Hamlets_C_Su_11_TT.pdf
We're really sorry if this has caused any inconvenience. Please do get in touch with us on the details below if you have any questions.
Yours sincerely, The NCS Team – The Challenge
Phone: 0203 542 2400 Email: contact@ncsthechallenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 9am - 3pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
